original_title: Last Podcast on the Left: Live in New Orleans
overview: Join Last Podcast on the Left LIVE from New Orleans. Last Podcast on the Left covers all topics mysterious and macabre and their live show is no different: The boys are BACK IN THE HABIT, exposing elaborate conspiracy theories, elusive cryptids, slippery serial killers, and MORE.  This special was recorded at The Joy Theater in 2019.
title: Last Podcast on the Left: Live in New Orleans
